channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Companion App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Companion App

item.title: CVE-2020-4020|2024-08-04T07:52:20.594Z -- atlassian -- companion%20app
item.description: The file downloading functionality in the Atlassian Companion App before version 1.0.0 allows remote attackers, who control a Confluence Server instance that the Companion App is connected to, execute arbitrary .exe files via a Protection Mechanism Failure.

item.title: CVE-2020-4019|2024-08-04T07:52:20.834Z -- atlassian -- companion%20app
item.description: The file editing functionality in the Atlassian Companion App before version 1.0.0 allows local attackers to have the app run a different executable in place of the app's cmd.exe via a untrusted search path vulnerability.
